review:
One of the most genuine Gynic I have seen , I have been visiting this doctor since 2 years almost  and today I am happy with healthy baby girl who was delivered by Meena mam Normally. 
She was always there with right guidance before , through out my pregnancy and till date. She is always available for her patients makes them feel comfortable fills confidence gives no unnecessary medication. 
I will surely recommend this doctor for the couples who are planning for baby !

I had visited the hospital and it was thyroid and PCOD issues. ****** *** **** ** ********** **. It was quite helpful and all queries were sorted out and given good treatment. I can definitely recommend the doctor to my family or friends. Medicine was prescribed by doctor during consultation. Scanning and blood test was done. Medication helped me a lot. There was no waiting time in the hospital when we went. Doctor was very friendly. Exercise, diet was suggested.

As of now, two of my sessions have completed. The treatment was quite satisfactory. She gave a proper details about the analysis and only some important tests were suggested for diagnosis purpose. I don't remember the exact wait time but it was reasonable and I am happy with the overall experience.

I would not recommend this doctor. I went to them to get treatment for PCOS, they enquired of all the symptoms I was facing and was understanding until they asked me if I was married and trying to have kids. When I said no, I'm not married or trying to have kids. They told me to return to them only when I was married and not to worry about it until I wanted to get pregnant. They finally recommended some tests only after I explained how much the symptoms were affecting me and was almost in tears. 

It's very disappointing that my health issues were not taken seriously because I was not trying to get pregnant. ** ****** ********* *** *** ****** ** *** ********* * ***** ***** ***** ** **** *******
**** **** ******* always listens you patiently, no unneceessary medicines and test. Just delivered my baby at Cloudnine and as assured by Meena Mam delivered normally.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She is very Friendly n makes us feel comfortable.she explains the situation in such a way we will not get panic.n waiting time is also less n she comes on time.
